title: typeFORUM
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053452/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Blogs](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053452/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Blogs) : typeFORUM**

[typeforum.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053452/http:/www.typeforum.de/)

German-language typographic discussion forum and news service, founded and administered by [Ingo Preuss](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053452/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ingo%20Preuss). [Andreas Seidel](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053452/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andreas%20Seidel) is a frequent contributor.
author: dan_reynolds
